ocean.question: I have a shell and move very slowly. Who am I?

hints.text: 🏠 I carry my house on my back.
🥬 I like to eat plants.
🐌 I am known for being slow.

ocean.question: I am a large animal that lives in the ocean and has black and white markings. What am I?

hints.text: 🐋 I am a mammal.
🌊 I like to leap out of the water.
🐼 I am the ocean's version of a panda.

ocean.question: I have eight arms and live in the ocean. Who am I?

hints.text: 🐙 I can change color to hide.
💨 I squirt ink when I am scared.
⛰️ I like to hide in caves.

ocean.question: I am a fish with a very flat body. Sometimes I shock my prey!

hints.text: 🪃 I have a long tail, sometimes with a barb.
⛱️ I'm often found in shallow, sandy areas.
⚡Some types of me can deliver an electric shock.

ocean.question: I am a group of sea animals living together, often very colorful. What am I called?

hints.text: 🧱 I provide shelter for many fish.
🐠 Many colorful fish live in me.
🪨 I am made of tiny animals.

ocean.question: I am a very large sea creature, the biggest animal on Earth. Who am I?

hints.text: 🎶 I sing songs that travel far.
🌬️ I breathe air through a blowhole.
krill is my favourite food.

ocean.question: I am a seabird that cannot fly, but I am great at swimming in cold water. What am I?

hints.text: 🧊 I live in Antarctica.
👔 I look like I'm wearing a tuxedo.
🐟 Fish are my favorite.

ocean.question: I am a current caused by differences in ocean water density. What am I called?

hints.text: 🌡️ I'm affected by temperature and saltiness.
🌊 I help distribute heat around the globe.
🔄 I'm a very slow, large-scale movement of water.

ocean.question: I am a very deep part of the ocean, deeper than Mount Everest is tall. What am I?

hints.text: 🌑 I am extremely dark and cold.
🌊 I am a trench in the Pacific Ocean.
🔬 Scientists explore me with special submarines.

ocean.question: I am a tiny animal that is a key part of the ocean food chain and glows in the dark. What am I?

hints.text: ✨ I cause bioluminescence in the ocean.
🐳 Whales and many other creatures eat me.
🦐 I am a type of crustacean.

weather.question: I fall from the sky, but I'm not rain. I'm cold and white, what am I?

hints.text: ❄️ I'm made of frozen water.
🌨️ I often fall during winter.
⛄ You can build a snowman with me.

weather.question: I am hot and yellow and give light in the day. What am I?

hints.text: 🌞 Plants need me to grow.
😎 I make you feel warm.
🌕 I am not the moon.

weather.question: I come from clouds and make everything wet. What am I?

hints.text: 💧 You need an umbrella when I appear.
🌧️ I help flowers grow.
☔ I am water falling from the sky.

weather.question: I am air moving fast, sometimes gently, sometimes with a roar. What am I?

hints.text: 🍃 I can blow leaves off trees.
🌬️ I can make a kite fly.
🌪️ A very strong version of me is called a hurricane.

weather.question: I'm white and puffy and float in the sky. Sometimes I bring rain. What am I?

hints.text: 🐑 I can look like sheep.
☁️ Airplanes fly through me.
💧 I am made of water droplets.

weather.question: I am a flash of light in the sky, often followed by a loud crash. What am I?

hints.text: ⚡ I can be dangerous.
🌩️ I usually happen during a storm.
🔊 You see me before you hear me.

weather.question: I am many colors in the sky, appearing after the rain when the sun shines through. What am I?

hints.text: 🌈 I have the colors of the rainbow.
☀️ I need both sun and rain to appear.
⚗️ Scientists use prisms to make me.

weather.question: I am small balls of ice that fall from the sky, sometimes during a thunderstorm. What am I?

hints.text: 🧊 I am frozen.
⛈️ I can damage cars and plants.
🎾 I am smaller than a tennis ball.

weather.question: I am a rotating, funnel-shaped cloud that can cause a lot of damage. What am I?

hints.text: 🌪️ I am very dangerous and destructive.
🐄 People and animals seek shelter from me.
💨 I have very strong winds.

weather.question: I am a big storm with strong winds and heavy rain, formed over warm ocean waters. What am I?

hints.text: 🌀 I have an eye in the center of the storm.
🌊 I can cause flooding and coastal damage.
💨 My winds spin counter-clockwise in the Northern Hemisphere.
